document.title: UX Report: DataONE Prototype Catalog Site Test Report
document.abstract: The Usability and Assessment Working Group conducted an onsite usability test at the Joint DataONE CI/CE Meeting in New Mexico on May 25th and May 27th, 2010. The purpose of the test was to assess the usability of the web search and search results interface design. This document contains the participant feedback and subjective ratings. A copy of the scenarios and questionnaires are included in the Attachmentsâ€™ section.
document.publication-title: DataONE Sociocultural and Usability & Assessment Working Groups
